PROGRAMME/DEGREE

REQUIREMENTS  
  
  
  
  
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME

WESLEYUNI       
  
FORENSIC SCIENCE:  
POL-ACAD    
  
  
   (iii) ABSU requires ‘O’ level credit pass in Physics.  
(iv) EBSU, IMSU and COOU accept ‘O' level pass in English 
Language.  
(v) UMUDIKE same as in Food Science and Technology  
(vi) EBSU accepts Agricultural Science in lieu of Biology and ‘O’ 
level pass in Physics.  
(vii) NDU requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes at not more than 
two (2) sittings.  
(viii) CRUTECH- Same as Biological Science.  
(ix) AJAYI requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes which must 
include  English language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, 
and Biology at one (1) sitting or six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes 
at not more than two (2) sittings.  
(x) MAIDUGURI accepts ‘O’ level passes in    English Language 
and Mathematics.  
(xi) CUAB accepts ‘O’ level credit pass in Agricultural Science in 
lieu of Biology.  
(xii) EBSU requires ’O’ level credit pass in Mathematics or Physics.  
(xiii) BELLS require five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in English 
Language, Mat hematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology/ 
Geography/ Further Mathematics/ Agricultural Science.  
(xiv) REDEEMER'S requires five (5) 'O' level  credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics and 
Biology/ Agricultural Sciences.  
(xv) WESTERN-DEL requires five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes which 
must include Chemistry, English Language, Biology, 
Mathematics and Physics.  
(xvi) PLASU – Same as in Chemistry.  
(xvii) GOUU accepts ‘O’ level credit pass in any other Science 
subject in lieu of Physics.  
(xviii) KWASU accepts ‘O’ level credit passes in Further 
Mathematics and Agricultural Science.
